patterns_discovered: Generic graph construction with type-safe node/edge management
gotchas_discovered: Cycle detection is critical in dependency graphs
Need to handle scenarios where dependent indicators might not exist
Careful management of node indices and graph structure

approach_outcome.description: Implement DAG builder with petgraph for dependency resolution and topological sort
key_components: ExecutionPlan for managing topologically sorted indicators

recommendations: Consider adding performance benchmarks for large dependency graphs
Implement more comprehensive documentation with edge case examples
Add unit tests for complex dependency scenarios
Potentially create a visualization tool for debugging dependency graphs
